abstract: In proposing to buy Circuit City, Blockbuster says it wants to combine hardware, software, digital media and retail. That sounds a lot like a plan to copy Apple. So far investors are not buying it.
snippet: In proposing to buy Circuit City, Blockbuster says it wants to combine hardware, software, digital media and retail. That sounds a lot like a plan to copy Apple. So far investors are not buying it.
lead_paragraph: Can two floundering retailers turn themselves into the next Apple?
